name: Drum Pad Extreme
description:
Drum Pad Extreme is the easy beat making instrument for creating EDM beats and music!

This drum pad free simulator will suits everyone’s beat making styles. Make beats and music anytime and anywhere with this drum machine. Want to create music beats as a famous beatmaker? Mix sounds from different styles and genres with rhythm pad.

Drum Pad Extreme has 3 gameplay mode for every player even players who don't know anything about Launchpad can play it in the best easiest way. The perfect app for DJs and music producers. But it serves well for the fans. Simple, intuitive interface. Easy to play.

Drum Pad Extreme (Drum Extreme) let's you play on a real drum kit and learn thousands songs in no time! You did not think playing music was that easy right?
Drum Pad Extreme has multiple classic drum kits that consist of bass, snare, tom-tom drums and percussions like hi-hat, crash, ride, cowbell cymbals...

Now everything you need to mix beats and create music is on your device!

Features:
- Multi-touch
- Easy to play
- For the DJs and fans
- Free trendy song packs with regular updates.
- Keep up with beat makers that you follow and discover new content daily.
- Many SFX in the different genre: EDM, Rock, Pop, Country...
- Drum Pad Extreme has the different type of sounds:
+ Snares
+ FX
+Vocals
+ Base lines
+ Kiks
+ Hats
+ Big kicks
+ Synth chords
+ Synth one shots
- Realistic sounds
- Easy to play
- For the DJs and fans
- Works on all screen resolutions - Cell Phones and Tablets.
